name: Demon Pact
description:
You, a lonely adventurer, find yourself in a mysterious dungeon. You have no idea, how you got there. Suddenly a strange creature emerge from the shadows. It is a demon, offering you a pact you cannot decline.

Survive as long as you can by slashing enemies and collecting their life essence, collect gold and potions, that make you stronger, from the crates.

Steering with WASD, Attack with SPACE (hold space to charge a strong attack).

Your score is determined by the time you have survived and gold you have collected!

created for ludum dare 44 https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/demonpact
